description:
The natural boundaries of the land area around the Sea Scheldt.
The information is used by the Flemish Hydrography in the ECS for the Scheldt pilots.
keywords: Schelde, morfodynamiek, natuurlijke afbakening, afbakening, begrenzing, natuurlijke begrenzing, Scheldt, morphodynamics, natural demarcation, demarcation, boundary, natural boundary
name: Natural boundary (Sea Scheldt, unknown)
